snippet: The United States told Pakistan on Friday that it would not send ground troops to attack militants in North Waziristan.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

lead_paragraph: The United States told Pakistan on Friday that it would not send ground troops to attack militants in North Waziristan.

headline.main: Pakistan: U.S. Assures Ally, ‘No Boots on the Ground’
